# Resource: samsungcloudplatform_transit_gateway_peering_cancel

Cancel Peering Request.


## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "samsungcloudplatform_transit_gateway_peering_cancel" "cancel" {
  transit_gateway_peering_id = var.transit_gateway_peering_id
}
```

- `transit_gateway_peering_id` (String) Transit Gateway Peering Id
